hero.title: Leonardo Castignani
hero.subtitle: Freelance Web & Software Developer. I create fast websites, custom applications, and modern digital experiences for businesses and individuals.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a freelance programmer and web developer based in the Marche region, currently completing a degree in Computer Science at the University of Camerino. I specialize in modern website creation and software development, combining advanced technical skills with a strong focus on usability and SEO.
about.p2: I approach every project with an analytical approach: from a simple showcase site to complex web applications. I believe in code quality and actively participate in the open-source community to stay up-to-date on the latest technologies.

experiences.description: Design and development of responsive websites and custom software. I manage the entire digital product lifecycle: requirements analysis, front-end/back-end development, performance optimization, and final release.

Actively contributed to analyzing and resolving bugs in existing applications, improving software stability. I also collaborated on developing new features, applying testing and debugging methodologies in a professional environment.
First experience in a corporate setting, where I supported the development team with programming tasks and learned team dynamics and industry best practices under the guidance of senior developers.
